summary: Frontend Valentine page and evasive No behavior are implemented in App.tsx with a romantic theme in Tailwind/CSS, and the success state references the requested meme image. However, the required static image asset itself is not present in the diff summary, and several unrequested/auth-related and backend files were added (violating the frontend-only/non-auth scope).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated meme image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the ‚ÄúYes‚Äù success state.
missing_requirements.reason: The success UI references the image path, but the diff summary does not show the actual image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated. Only code/CSS/HTML files are listed as added; no PNG/static asset is included.
evidence: File diff summary (Added files list does not include frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-good-choice-meme.dim_900x900.png)

missing_requirements.requirement: When the user clicks ‚ÄúYes‚Äù, transition the UI to show a meme image along with the text ‚ÄúGood choice‚Äù.
missing_requirements.reason: The success heading text is "Good Choice! üíï" rather than exactly "Good choice" as specified in the acceptance criteria; the exact required string is not shown verbatim.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity provider/authentication hooks and React Query actor setup (authentication-related infrastructure).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists login/Internet Identity integration as non-goals and says no third-party auth providers are needed; page should be frontend-only without auth. The diff adds InternetIdentityProvider usage and related hooks.
evidence: frontend/src/main.tsx (wraps App in InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider)

hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints say to keep backend changes unnecessary and implement as a frontend-only experience unless strictly required; an empty backend actor file was still added.

hallucinated_features.description: Promotional footer linking out to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements/non-goals; adds extra feature/content beyond the Valentine question and success meme flow.
